item.title: [PI]Adding an altar restoring spec evry 120[PI]
item.dc:creator: @fasthop10 fasthop10
item.description:
@fasthop10 wrote:

Rocky2k10:

can anyone help me abit? could it be possible to turn this into a Special restore potion?

add this into potions.java, change the item case to any potion u want, i chose a one dose potion further editing can make it 4 if wanted

[code] case 17594:
c.startAnimation(829);
c.playerLevel[5] += (c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) * .33);
c.getItems().deleteItem(17594, 1);
if (c.playerLevel[5] > c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]))
c.playerLevel[5] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(5);
if(c.specAmount < 10.0){
c.specAmount = 10.0;
c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]);

                    }
                    break;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Adding an altar restoring spec evry 120[PI]
item.dc:creator: @i_got_y i got y
item.description:
@i_got_y wrote:

[quote=“Eson, post:1, topic:382344”]I don’t know if it’s a snippet or Tut you may move if you want

Difficulty: 1/10
Knowledge: C+P
Tested On: PI.
Classes Modified: Objectmanager.java , Actionhandler.java, and maybe Commands.java., client.java

adding the altar.

First go to objectmanager.java and search for

and add this under it ;

This is will spawn the Altar, at the XXXX and YYYY put the X coords and the Y coords, that will say at which place the altar will be , you can check this by doing ::mypost or ::coords, if you don’t have ::mypos or ::coords add this to Commands.Java

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("mypos")) { c.sendMessage("X: "+c.absX); c.sendMessage("Y: "+c.absY); }

Second, making it Restore prayer AND Special

First go to Actionhandler.java , and if you already have a altar added search for case 409, you will see somthing like this under it ;

if(c.playerLevel[5] < c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5])) { c.startAnimation(645); c.playerLevel[5] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]); c.sendMessage("You recharge your prayer points."); c.getPA().refreshSkill(5); } else { c.sendMessage("You already have full prayer points."); }
under the last ’ } ’ add This ;if(c.specAmount < 10.0){ if (c.specRestore > 0) return; c.specRestore = 120; c.specAmount = 10.0; c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]); c.sendMessage("Your special attack has been restored, only every 120 seconds."); } break;
if you don’t have a altar added search for Break; and under it Add ;

case 409: if(c.playerLevel[5] < c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5])) { c.startAnimation(645); c.playerLevel[5] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]); c.sendMessage("You recharge your prayer points."); c.getPA().refreshSkill(5); } else { c.sendMessage("You already have full prayer points."); } if(c.specAmount < 10.0){ FUCKING piece of shit fuck ur self first fuck ur mom and fix this u stupid ass whole fucking gay if (c.specRestore > 0) return; c.specRestore = 120; c.specAmount = 10.0; c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]); c.sendMessage("Your special attack has been restored, only every 120 seconds."); } break;
if you don’t want it to be 120 seconds just change c.specRestore = 120; tho somthing else like 240= 3 mins

last but not least go to client.java and search for public int and add this somewhere with all the other ints

Then search for somthing like

if(isDead && respawnTimer == -6) { getPA().applyDead(); }

under that last } add

if(specRestore > 0) { specRestore --; }

save compile and run that should do the trick, tought this was helpfull so posted this, if it’s bad i will remove :)[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Adding an altar restoring spec evry 120[PI]
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

Add this method:

public int isSpecialAttack() { if(c.specAmount < 10.0){ if (c.specRestore > 0) return; c.specRestore = 10; c.specAmount = 10.0; c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]); c.sendMessage("You restore your special attack."); } }

Then add:

case PotionID: isSpecialAttack(itemId,163,slot,1,true); // Special Attack potion, only can be drinkin every 10 seconds. break;

Read full topic
